title: Brown rug

properties.name: description
properties.value: A brown rug can be built in the Rug space of the Parlour, Bedroom, Chapel, and Portal Nexus in a player-owned house. It requires 2 Construction to build and when built, it gives 30 experience.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Brown rug
Brown rug
Icon
Furniture nameRug
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Level2
Experience30 xp
RoomParlour, Bedroom, Chapel, Portal Nexus
HotspotRug space
FlatpackableNo
ExamineIt's an ugly rug, but better than a bare floor.
Advanced data
Object ID6759, 6760, 6761
Icon Item ID8316

A brown rug can be built in the Rug space of the Parlour, Bedroom, Chapel, and Portal Nexus in a player-owned house. It requires 2 Construction to build and when built, it gives 30 experience.

A '''brown rug''' can be built in the [[Rug space]] of the [[Parlour]], [[Bedroom]], [[Chapel]], and [[Portal Nexus]] in a [[player-owned house]]. It requires 2 [[Construction]] to build and when built, it gives 30 [[experience]].

==Creation==
{{Recipe
|skill1 = Construction
|skill1lvl = 2
|skill1boostable = Yes
|skill1exp = 30
|members = Yes
|ticks = 5
|tools = Saw, Hammer
|mat1 = Bolt of cloth
|mat1quantity = 2
|output1 = Brown rug
|output1pic = Brown rug icon
|output1cost = 0
}}
